content: ITT’s segment margin in Q2 will likely be flat to Q1 at approximately 16%, with margin expansion in IP and CCT offset by an approximate a 200 basis point decline in MT margin sequentially given the material inflation headwind. So on price/cost, as we mentioned, we are -- we were behind in Q1, and this was both from a lower price recovery performance as well as increased cost inflation that we’re seeing mainly on raw materials.
